programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian finds a way to install a new suspension and massive tires under a Smart car to turn it into a desert pre-runner.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian brings in a 1968 M715 to make it more reliable; he takes the body off the original chassis and stretches a Jeep JK chassis to make it fit; he adds upgraded suspension, 1-ton axles and an LS engine to make it a truck that can fight any battle.

programme.title: All Girls Garage
programme.desc: A GTO that has spent a lot of its life in shops with mechanics who had no intention of finishing it, is brought in by its owner for some final touches, including checking gauges, air conditioning and the steering column.

programme.title: All Girls Garage
programme.desc: The team brings back the 442 Tribute car to give it a new LS engine and finish modifying the interior for the previously-installed TKO transmission.

programme.title: Car Fix
programme.desc: The guys pull apart a transmission to show the wear items, and install a performance clutch on a modified Chevy.

programme.title: Car Fix
programme.desc: Fuller brings in a twin-turbo, thousand-horsepower Cutlass to do some custom fabrication and build an all-new interior.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Since the Bronco is back, Ian pays homage to the very cool box-style Bronco of the past. He helps with the handling by adding an upgraded suspension, and adds new bumpers for a more aggressive look. Plus, he fixes some gremlins in the inline-six mot.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: How a factory two-door Toyota Tacoma can be made into the perfect off-road truck with the right axles and suspension.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.desc: The guys test three LS oil pumps in different volume and oil pressure configurations to see if too much pressure reduces horsepower.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.sub-title: Solid Lifter Cam Comparo; Roller vs. Flat Tappet
programme.desc: It's the age-old battle of power vs. price; investigating whether choosing a solid flat tappet sacrifices power and whether the extra power of the hydraulic is worth it; talking duration, lobe intensity, spring pressures, dollars and horsepower.

programme.title: Dirt Every Day
programme.desc: The Dirt-Heads plan is to winch a Chevy K5 Blazer on a trailer and head to the desert for some four-wheeling, with stops on the way to get it running and modified.

programme.title: Dirt Every Day
programme.desc: Fred is on a mission to find his newest project car; he gets wind of a barn-find, a 1961 Jeep Willys Wagon and is determined to bring it back to life with all new upgrades.

programme.title: Speed Is the New Black
programme.desc: More than 40 years since totaling a 1971 Chevelle a new client is ready to rebuild his first dream car; starting from a bare frame, the crew begins the process of giving this Chevelle a new life, one that will turn heads at shows, and on the road.

programme.title: Runs Good
programme.desc: Two brothers set out to build matching Track Rat Porsches; one lost interest due to lack of funds and time; with a Porsche racing pedigree and a not-so-stock surprise under the hood, Shea thinks this 944 is the perfect project to rescue.

programme.title: Head 2 Head
programme.sub-title: REAL SUVs Battle Royale! Jeep Wrangler Rubicon vs. Mercedes-Benz G550
programme.desc: Jonny and Jethro head off the beaten path to look at two of the last hardcore production SUVs left on Earth like the Jeep Wrangler and the Mercedes G class.

programme.title: Head 2 Head Drag Race
programme.desc: Hypercars are still insane, but the idea of a supercar doesn't mean what it used to; a supercar is quiet, has room for family and friends, and delivers spine-crunching acceleration, plus exceptional range and even a luxurious driving experience.

programme.title: Super Turbo Story Time
programme.desc: Certain men in the history of cars were just made from different stuff; these two drivers achieved insane feats against impossible odds to prove that they are legends among legends.

programme.title: Super Turbo Story Time
programme.desc: Taking a trip back in time to the early days of the automobile, when the first enterprising car enthusiasts laid the foundations for the car world today.

programme.title: Roadkill's Junkyard Gold
programme.desc: Steve finds three great Furys and also zeroes in on two C-body convertibles with four-on-the-floor; the '68 Plymouth Sport Fury; a '69 Dodge Polara 500; the 440 Super Commando in the Fury triggered a special rear axle upgrade.

programme.title: Roadkill's Junkyard Gold
programme.sub-title: Fast With Class: Buick Muscle Cars
programme.desc: Steve tracks down a Buick '66 Riviera GS, a Buick '69 Skylark GS 400, a Buick '70 GS 455 convertible and an ultra-rare, Buick '70 Stage 1 GSX.

programme.title: Shorty's Dream Shop
programme.desc: The owner, Sanders, has had some bad luck with this '56 Belair going from shop to shop, and he still doesn't have his family dream car ready. Shorty's shop is the last stop. Joel and Shorty make sure this car is ready for the road.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.sub-title: The Magic of the Flex Fuel Sensor
programme.desc: The ability to run a blend of gas and E85 is a game changer; credit the flex fuel sensor, which samples fuel composition and adjusts fuel flow, making more power as more E85 is mixed in.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.desc: Do boost leaks really even matter? Can vacuum leaks make more power? You read those questions right. Come be surprised right along with us as we find power in unexpected places, and lose less than we'd expect in others.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek Bieri and Dave Chappelle find an old dually among a flock of chickens; with the goal of building this rig into a car-hauling shop truck, Derek sets his sights on major performance upgrades, while Dave gets to work on a custom suspension setup.

programme.title: Faster With Newbern and Cotten
programme.desc: The guys uncover a cop car racing series around the Ford Crown Victoria P71 Police Interceptor; with a handful of bolt-on upgrades, they turn their former police auction find into a road race ripper around Willow Springs.

programme.title: Runs Good
programme.desc: The team takes a short train ride to Santa Fe, New Mexico, to look at a Chevy Silverado 2500 that has an LS transplant; the previous owner wanted to turn it into a Sunday cruiser, but couldn't sort out why it would randomly shift into neutral.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.desc: The guys test three LS oil pumps in different volume and oil pressure configurations to see if too much pressure reduces horsepower.

programme.title: Engine Masters
programme.sub-title: Solid Lifter Cam Comparo; Roller vs. Flat Tappet
programme.desc: It's the age-old battle of power vs. price; investigating whether choosing a solid flat tappet sacrifices power and whether the extra power of the hydraulic is worth it; talking duration, lobe intensity, spring pressures, dollars and horsepower.
